a period of time during which a particular activity is stopped: a moratorium on sth The European Union imposed a two-year moratorium on new GM imports. end/impose/lift a moratorium
FINANCE
  (also debt moratorium) an agreed period of time during which a country does not have to pay its debt to other countries: An immediate debt moratorium would free resources for poor countries to spend on health and education programmes.
